attributes.action: Prevent the deportation of Isimeli Baleiwai
attributes.additional_details:
Fijian Isimeli Baleiwai who served in the British Army for 13 years is fighting to stay in the UK after being told he must leave the country by 9 August 2012.

L/Cpl Baleiwai served in Bosnia, Northern Ireland, Iraq twice and once in Afghanistan.

Please sign this petition demanding that the Home Office reconsider his situation and ultimately grant him the right to remain in the UK
